title: MINI - worldwide sales volume 2006 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in units, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2009.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2018 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2009 to 2006.
gold: Deliveries of BMW MINI-badged cars stood at about 361,500 units in 2018 . BMW has operated the MINI brand since 2000 and adapted the trademark compact style originally designed by Birmingham-based British Motor Corporation ( BMC ) to meet modern preferences . In the UK , the MINI brand was launched with great success .
